name: Dozer (AspectWaltz, aruniecrisps)
description:
Go postal. Use the left mouse button to reverse. point your mouse to change directions. Destroy buildings! Avoid tanks. Have fun!

Aspect Waltz: A note on tools. the sound effects are just pitch shifted brownian noise or a snare i made in audacity. OST in LMMS. game in Godot. models in picoCAD and blender.

An additional note. I have a bug where small building aren't rendering for some reason.
